Uses of Class
artificiallifefx.AnEntity

    • Uses of AnEntity in artificiallifefx

      Subclasses of AnEntity in artificiallifefx 
      Modifier and Type Class and Description
      class  ACarnivore
      Inherited from ALifeform, this class is represented as a Bee and has different pack behaviour to herbivores.
      class  AFood
      Inherited from AnEntity, this abstract class sets up the functions shared by AFruit and APlant
      class  AFruit
      Inherited from AFood, this class creates consumable entities (fruit)
      class  AHerbivore
      Inherited from ALifeform, this class is represented as a Ant and has different pack behaviour to carnivores.
      class  ALifeform
      Inherited from AnEntity, this sets up the functions and variables needed by all moving, consuming entities (herbivores and carnivores)
      class  AnObstacle
      This class creates immovable objects that entities must avoid while searching for food
      class  APlant
      Inherited from AFood, this class creates plants which will create food items
      Fields in artificiallifefx with type parameters of type AnEntity 
      Modifier and Type Field and Description
      protected java.util.ArrayList<AnEntity> AWorld.entities
